trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
The delegate to call when the asynchronous method call is complete.
trans-unit.target: 异步方法调用完成时要调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: If <c>cb</c> is <see langword="null" />, the delegate is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>cb</c> 为 <see langword="null" />，则没有调用此委托。

trans-unit.source: Any additional data needed to process the request.
trans-unit.target: 处理请求所需的任何其他数据。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles asynchronous events such as application events.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理异步事件（如应用程序事件）的方法。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is called at the start of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 此委托在异步操作开始时调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that represents the result of the <see cref="T:System.Web.BeginEventHandler" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，它表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.BeginEventHandler" /> 操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.BeginEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.BeginEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.BeginEventHandler> delegate to register a handler an asynchronous page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.BeginEventHandler>委托以注册处理程序异步页。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。
有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。
